subject: Horse Racing
Veterinary Medicine
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: Despite having more than 20 opportunities this year, New York officials have never asked for a single necropsy of a horse, leaving the state out of step with other major racing centers.
snippet: Despite having more than 20 opportunities this year, New York officials have never asked for a single necropsy of a horse, leaving the state out of step with other major racing centers.
